data.Name: COIN
data.Bio: There are several artists named "Coin"; 1) Coin are a four piece band from Nashville, TN , formed in 2013 by Chase Lawrence (synth/vocals), Joe Memmel (guitar/vocals), Ryan Winnen (drums) and Zachary Dyke (bass). It's ok and Honey were promoted before the lead single, Run landed in January 2015. It was announced the Jay Joyce produced debut album will arrive in April 2015. How Will You Know If You Never Try June 2015 - "Coin" (Album) April 2017 - "How Will You Know If You Never Try" (Album) Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Current Joys
data.Bio: Nick Rattigan, also known as Current Joys and TELE/VISIONS, is an American singer-songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, vocalist, journalist and music video director, originating from Reno, Nevada. He currently releases music under the moniker Current Joys. He also is the drummer and lead singer of the indie surf rock band Surf Curse. Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Andrew McMahon in the Wilderness
data.Bio: Andrew McMahon in the Wilderness is the third musical project by Andrew McMahon, the former lead singer of Something Corporate and Jack's Mannequin. McMahon announced the moniker in a blog post in July 2014, stating, "as I embark on yet another musical adventure, I will be traveling with my band to many of those same stages, this time as “Andrew McMahon in the Wilderness”. I suppose my wilderness is mostly an abstract one. Since putting Jack’s behind me, I have forced myself into strange spaces seeking new stimulus..." Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: The Regrettes
data.Bio: The Regrettes is an American pop/rock band from Los Angeles. The band is led by frontwoman Lydia Night, alongside Genessa Gariano on guitar, Drew Thomsen on drums, and bassist Brooke Dickson. The band formed in 2015 and released a few singles before the band released their debut studio album, Feel Your Feelings Fool! on Warner Bros. Records in January 2017. They did multiple tours under which a tour with SWMRS in Europe and the US. The band toured Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: Smallpools
data.Bio: Smallpools is an indie pop/alternative band from Los Angeles, CA, United States. Forming in early 2013, the group released their debut single "Dreaming" on RCA Records, May 21, 2013. Thanks to catchy guitar hooks and internet blogs, Smallpools' "Dreaming" is now spreading like wildfire. "Dreaming" skyrocketed to the top of the HypeMachine chart in just hours. Dreaming had hit over 20,000 plays on Soundcloud before the band even hit 500 "likes" on Facebook (Stereofox). Read more on Last.fm

data.Name: COIN: Uncanny Valley Tour
data.Description: Based on the latest local guidelines, attendees are no longer required to provide proof of negative COVID-19 test AND/OR vaccination for entry into this event.
